content: this is a pattern for a stim toy / fidget toy incorporating pony beads it produces a flat square or rectangle with beads threaded onto the yarn which are able to be rolled back and forth it s heavier than a typical crocheted item of the same size and makes a pleasant noise when you roll it between your hands the pattern **can be adjusted** to practically any rectangular dimensions ie you can make it as long or as wide as you wish it s **pay-what-you-want** meaning it can be accessed for free but tips are greatly appreciated at the link click the ** download now ** button to get access to two pdf files 1 the 5-page default version of the pattern which includes hyperlinks and a few photos of my finished project 2 the 3-page printer-friendly version which has condensed formatting urls written out in full and no photos
